com.woelfware.blumote
Class Activities

java.lang.Object
  com.woelfware.blumote.Activities

public class Activities
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles activities which are created to allow combining devices on the interface - like "watch a DVD" and also allows for initialization sequences to be sent in a sequence The data is persistend in the SharedPreferences object

Author:
keusej

Method Detail

setWorkingActivity

public void setWorkingActivity(java.lang.String key)
sets the working activity. The Activities class depends on this being set prior to usage of any member functions.

Parameters:
key - The name of the activity that we want to work with

getWorkingActivity

public java.lang.String getWorkingActivity()
Receive the working activity that we set with setWorkingActivity()

Returns:
The working activity is returned

deleteActivity

public void deleteActivity(int position)
delete an activity from the arraylist on the interface. This function is usually invoked on a context menu on the arraylist that displays all the activities to the user

Parameters:
position - the position in the arraylist to delete

addActivity

public void addActivity(java.lang.String s)
add a new activity to the arraylist on the interface

Parameters:
s - the name of the activity to add to the arraylist

renameActivity

public void renameActivity(java.lang.String newName,
                           int position)
rename an activity on the interface, pass in new name and position in arraylist. This function will update the preferences file as well as update the interface arraylist.

Parameters:
newName - the new name
position - the position of the old name in the arraylist
